name: Make a word!
description: Here is a fun and educational puzzle game that helps in learning languages and new words. Find out how well you know words and how quickly will you be able to make Them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
